steps.text: You arrive at the town square.  You see a merchant who is looking quite glum.  He explains, "Thieves stole my precious {{valuable}}! I am pretty sure they fled to the Old Mill. Please help me recover it!"
steps.log: The merchant asked you to recover their stolen {{valuable}}

steps.text: The merchant is happy to see you've returned to the Town Square.  "Have you recovered my {{valuable}} from the thieves?", he asks, and is disappointed when you tell him you haven't.  I am pretty sure they fled to the Old Mill. If you hurry, they might still be there!
You arrive at the Old Mill. You hear voices inside.
You slip past the thieves unnoticed and find the {{valuable}} unprotected!  You are able to grab it and leave without being seen.
steps.log: Sneaked into the mill and recovered the {{valuable}}

steps.text: The thieves hear you! One blocks your path.
You intimidate the thieves into surrendering the {{valuable}}!
steps.log: Intimidated the thieves and recovered the {{valuable}}

steps.text: The thieves overpower you. You barely escape with your life.
steps.log: Failed to recover the {{valuable}} and got injured

steps.text: You approach peacefully. The thieves are willing to talk.

options.label: Offer them 3 silver for the item

steps.text: The thieves accept your silver and hand over the {{valuable}}.
steps.log: Bought the {{valuable}} from the thieves for 3 silver

steps.text: You defeat the thief and claim the {{valuable}}!
steps.log: Fought the thieves and recovered the {{valuable}}

steps.text: The thief beats you soundly. You limp away empty-handed.
steps.log: Lost the fight and failed to recover the {{valuable}}

steps.text: You run from the mill. The thieves laugh at your cowardice.
steps.log: Fled from the thieves in fear

steps.text: You leave the mill without the {{valuable}}.
The merchant is overjoyed to see their {{valuable}} returned!
The merchant gives you a bag of ripe oranges and their eternal gratitude!
steps.log: Returned the stolen item and earned a bag of oranges

steps.text: The merchant gives you 2 silver and their eternal gratitude!
steps.log: Returned the stolen item and earned 2 silver

steps.text: The merchant sees your injuries and sighs sadly. 'I appreciate you tried...'
"You ran away?" The merchant shakes his head in disbelief. "Well, I guess you tried."
